import React from 'react'; import { Link, Outlet, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import icon from '../assets/icon.png'; export default function Menu() { const location = useLocation(); const linkClass = (path) => `flex items-center space-x-2 px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-white font-medium transition ${ location.pathname === path ? 'bg-cyan-700 border border-cyan-300' : 'hover:bg-cyan-800' }`; return (
